named-query.name: TransaccionBovedaCaja.getByIdHistorialBoveda
named-query.query: SELECT t FROM TransaccionBovedaCajaEntity t WHERE t.historialBoveda.id = :idHistorialBoveda

named-query.name: TransaccionBovedaCaja.getByIdHistorialBovedaCaja
named-query.query: SELECT t FROM TransaccionBovedaCajaEntity t WHERE t.historialBovedaCaja.id = :idHistorialBovedaCaja
